results.title: Jaylon Ferguson, Baltimore Ravens Linebacker, Dies at 26
results.abstract: Mr. Ferguson was unresponsive when he was found in a house in North Baltimore, the authorities said. The Baltimore police said investigators “are not ruling out the possibility of an overdose.”

results.title: In Boebert’s District, as Elsewhere, Democrats Surge Into G.O.P. Primary
results.abstract: Thousands of Democrats in Western Colorado are voting in the primary on Tuesday against Representative Lauren Boebert, part of a broader effort to defeat far-right Republicans.

media.caption: “The center has got to re-emerge,” said Tom Morrison, center, a lifelong Democrat in rural Pitkin County who voted for the Republican candidate Don Coram, not only in protest of Representative Lauren Boebert but also of what he called a rising concern about his party’s leftward drift.
